name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程介紹物理學的基本觀念,並訓練學生運用這些基本觀念來解決科學問題, 內容包括線動量,轉動,力矩,角動量,靜力平衡,簡諧運動,及波等主題
schedule:
1. Kinetic energy and work
2. Potential energy and conservation of energy (I)
3. Potential energy and conservation of energy (II)
4.Center of mass and linear momentum (I)
5. Center of mass and linear momemtum (II)
6. Exam 1
7. Rotation (I)
8. Rotation (II)
9. Equilibrium and elasticity (I)
10. Equilibrium and elasticity  (II)
11. Exam 2
12. Fluids (I)
13. Fluids (II)
14. Oscillations (I)
15. Oscillations (II)
15. Waves (I)
16. Waves (II)
17. Review
18. Exam 3
materials:
”Fundamentals of Physics” by Halliday, Rensnick and Walker
9th Edition, Wiley (歐亞書局)
